testcase.name: TC12_User can create new patient with DB
testcase.system-out: Given User connects to DB...................................................passed When User creates a new patient in the patient table using the DB...........passed Then User verifies that new patient has been added to the DB................passed And User closes the DB connection...........................................passed

testcase.name: TC13_User can delete patient from DB
testcase.system-out: Given User connects to DB...................................................passed When User deletes a patient from patient table..............................passed Then User verifies that patient has been deleted............................passed And User closes the DB connection...........................................passed
